name: Born to mine
description:
Born to Mine extremely simple but engaging.

You find yourself in a mysterious dungeon and your goal is to reach its furtherst depths and collect greatest possible number of gold coins without falling down off the rails! And that is not so easy as it seems at first sight!

Several collapses that occured in the mine have caused blocks on some parts of the road. Time has also been unkind to some sections of the railroad track. That's why you have to maneuver like a Formula One racing driver if you don't want to fall off or collapse with an obstacle, otherwise, you'll have to start the race over. So, while you're playing Born to Mine, keep an eye on the blazed way all the time!

Choose the look for your transport and character that will be at the wheel to set out on an exciting journey. The range of colorful skins is so rich it makes you dizzy! While daily tasks will be an extra challenge for the most hardcore treasure seekers.
Never before has a gold fever been so exciting!
And like any other fever - it's contagious!

Distinctive features of Born to Mine:

* colorful 3D graphics;
* free-to-play model;
* unlimited play session;
* accessible one finger controls;
* various skins for transport;
* various skins for the main character;
* ranking rosters;
* daily tasks;
* endless gameplay;
* nonstop updates;
* fantastic game design and locations.

It takes only one session to play Born to Mine and immediately emerge into the incredible atmosphere, feel like a famous treasure seeker or a simple adventurer who has itchy feet.
The game is well-balanced between moderate complexity and entertainment. Gather together to see who will set the highest record among your acquaintances, friends and family members!

Train your reaction skills on a breathtaking ride, boost your energy by collecting coins, go beyond your limits and set new records!

Jump in a speeding trolley to explore dungeons, collect gold, dodge rockfalls and obstacles and get loaded with pure positivity!

Also, try to answer the following questions:

* How deep is the dungeon and does it even have an end?
* How much gold does it hide in its depths?
* Is there anything else kept in secret, and if there is, what is it?

Follow regular updates not to miss out the ongoing addition of new features, missions and challenges making Born to Mine constantly evolving, the auditory to grow and rates to rise with the fight for a line in the top getting hotter!

Add a little bit of cinematic adventure to your routine! And don't forget that you can install Born to Mine for free.

Born to Mine is a breath of fresh air in the endless diversity of casual games! You can spend 5 minutes or 5 hours in the game and not get bored for a second!

Explore the dungeon and get the main reward - a line in the ranking roster!

Are YOU ready? Then let's go after the gold!
